short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Track your job applications with ease! ✅

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
JobStackz is your Chrome extension superpower ‍♀️  to organize your job search like a boss!

Stop juggling a million tabs! ‍♀️  Browse jobs as usual, and JobStackz automatically tracks your applications across your favorite job boards  (LinkedIn, Greenhouse, Lever, Workday - more coming soon!).

**Focus on what matters: landing your dream job! ** 
JobStackz lets you:

- Track applications like a pro! No more spreadsheets or forgotten follow-ups.

- Store valuable resources! Keep interview prep materials, company research, and anything else you need close at hand.

- Craft connection messages on-the-go! Have pre-written LinkedIn request templates ready to personalize with a single click.

Plus, JobStackz takes privacy seriously! Your data is safe with YOU. We simply do not collect it :)

Ready to take control of your career destiny?  
Install JobStackz today and unleash your inner job-hunting hero!
